name: UNRESTRAINED
description:
UNRESTRAINED - is a great 3D horror game in which you have to survive in a mental hospital, playing as a reporter named Carl.
The aim of the game is very simple. You fight with monsters, look for ammunitions, keys that help to do the next locations.
On your way there will be various mutants who crave your death. There are three kinds of guns that help you to win all enemies. Clean locations, do the next levels, save ammunitions and you will enjoy the game.

KEY FEATURES:

1) Three big levels.
2) Hardcore and dynamic gameplay.
3) Old-school graphics.
4) Exciting atmosphere.
